name: Monkey Blast Forever
description:
Monkey Blast Forever is a casual action adventure game for your Android device! And it's free! Swing from tree to tree collecting bananas and other fruit! But watch out! You have to time your jumps perfectly or you could fall and hurt yourself!

Mitch the small monkey is very hungry. So he has to find and collect hard to reach fruit in the jungle.But the jungle is very large and dangerous.Your task is to help Mitch the monkey run out of the jungle and collect more bananas and other fruit to survive. Run monkey run!

Banana Kong!

Run, jump, double jump, bounce and swing on vines as you help Mitch the monkey to outrun a huge banana avalanche! Keep full control with highly responsive single-finger tap and swipe controls.

Controls:

- Tap to jump

- Tap again to double jump

- Land on platforms for safety

- Collect as many fruit as possible

- Land in a cannon to fire yourself to the next location

Features:

- Absolutely gorgeous jungle landscapes

- Endless jumping gameplay

- Score and high score tracking

- Free and easy casual game

- Jungle, Waterfalls, Hills, etc.

- Simple to learn but hard to master unique one-button gameplay

- Feel the joy of flying through the jungle

Enjoy a great free casual monkey jungle game today! Hope around in this epic adventure! How long can you last?

Check us out!
